summary: Just some guns to play with in skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2]Inspired from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26329/?]Automatic Crossbows[/url] by J3X & Rizing - Most of the mod credit is given to them due to it being a re-skin of their mod

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wWPWe7e.png[/img]

This mod adds a bunch of Automatic Guns into skyrim.
From AK47 to M4A1 and a bunch more guns you will be shooting bandits, dragons, & BRAITH for days.

You can acquire these guns at any forge once you have the perk SteelSmithing
SteelSmithing - player.addperk 000CB40D

[u]INSTALL[/u]
[/size][/color][/font][/b][list=1]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]Extract the AutomaticGuns.Zip file to your desktop[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]Open C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]Drag and Drop the files from AutomaticGuns into your Skyrim Data folder[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]And then you should be set, After that just enable it in your skyrim launcher and your done[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AESRYL
